short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves your Trello boards with things like card colors and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps you get a better overview of your Trello board by changing the colors of your cards based on the attached labels.

Trello Utils help you easily find what you're looking for on your board, by expanding the label color to fill the whole card. This makes it super easy, at a glance, to find eg. all "Bug" or "Frontend development" cards.
